abilities.name: Punch
abilities.description: A punch thrown by a heavy elemental hand. Ouch!

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.description: The elemental throws his weight on an opponent trying to crush them with their strength

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Flames whoosh and erupt violently burning everything inside the spell's radius

abilities.name: Ice Blast
abilities.description: An ice crystal erupts amidst a blizzard that chills and damages everything caught in its radius. Struck targets get reduced Defense and Magic Defense for 2 rounds.

abilities.name: Flamethrower
abilities.description: A steady output of fiery death that is sure to crisp anything unlucky enough to be caught in its radius

abilities.name: Ice Line
abilities.description: Crystals of ice erupt from the earth damaging anything in their path.

abilities.name: Flame Slam
abilities.description: The elemental throws his weight on an opponent trying to crush them with their strength and imbues its flaming nature burning them to a crisp.

abilities.name: Ice Slam
abilities.description: The elemental throws his weight on an opponent, trying to crush them with their strength and imbues its icy nature in it, making enemies slower weaker decreasing their Attack and Magic Attack for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Elemental Heal
abilities.description: The spirit draws its element from the spirit world to replenish a little health.

abilities.name: Line of Brambles
abilities.description: Brambles sprout out of the earth with deadly thorns that pierce everything on their path

abilities.name: Enhance Attack
abilities.description: A magical blessing that increases the target's Attack for 2 rounds

abilities.name: Enhance Magic Attack
abilities.description: A magical blessing that increases the target's Magic Attack for 2 rounds

abilities.name: Lightning Strike
abilities.description: Call upon the powers of the forest to smite your enemies with lighting

abilities.name: Mass Enhance Attack
abilities.description: A strong magical blessing that increases all targets Attack and Magic Attack for 3 rounds

abilities.name: Mass Enhance Defense
abilities.description: A strong magical blessing that increases all targets Defense and Magic Defense for 3 rounds

abilities.name: Weakening Curse
abilities.description: A magical curse that decreases the target's Attack and Magic Attack for 2 rounds

abilities.name: Curse of Vulnerability
abilities.description: A magical curse that decreases the target's Defense and Magic Defense for 2 rounds

abilities.name: Arcane Blast
abilities.description: Magical energy causes arcane crystals to erupt from the earth damaging anyone in the vincinity

abilities.name: Arcane Downpour
abilities.description: A violent explosion of magic that crackles with arcane energy disintegrating everything on its impact radius

abilities.name: Unholy Curse
abilities.description: A vile arcane incantation that reduces the afflicted's Defense, Magic Defense, Attack and Magic Attack

abilities.name: Slash
abilities.description: A basic sword slash. It is described as basic, but it is made with a heavy two handed weapon wielded by a strong warrior and the damage it deals is not basic at all.

abilities.name: Powerful Slash
abilities.description: A powerful sword slash. If a normal slash hurts this much I don't want to imagine what the powerful variation does.

abilities.name: Decimating Slash
abilities.description: A slash that is more focused on impeding the enemies' defenses rather than dealing damage. It reduces the target's Defense and Magic Defense

abilities.name: Inspire!
abilities.description: An insirational roar that increases the target's Attack for 2 rounds

abilities.name: Free Powerful Slash
abilities.description: This ability does not cost any action points, only Power Points. The dreaded Powerful Slash in the charming price of only 2 power points!

abilities.name: Powerful Slash Wave
abilities.description: What is better than Powerful Slash? Powerful Slash that hits many enemies!

abilities.name: Sword Attack
abilities.description: A sword attack that does mild damage

abilities.name: Cure Wounds
abilities.description: A prayer that restores a small amount of the target's HP

abilities.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
abilities.description: A prayer that restores a moderate amount of the target's HP

abilities.name: Mass Cure Wounds
abilities.description: A prayer that restores a moderate amount of HP in an area

abilities.name: Holy Fire
abilities.description: A prayer brings down the holy flames of the gods to smite the evil

abilities.name: Holy Avenger
abilities.description: The gods bestow you a great blessing that increases your HP for 20 and Attack, Magic Attack, Defense and Magic Defense for 2d6

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.description: An attack to the vital points of the targets

abilities.name: Impede Attack
abilities.description: A targeted strike that stops the innate bodily energy. The strike impedes Attack for 2 rounds.

abilities.name: Impede Magic Attack
abilities.description: A targeted strike that stops the innate bodily energy. The strike impedes Magic Attack for 2 rounds.

abilities.name: Impede Defense
abilities.description: A targeted strike that stops the innate bodily energy. The strike impedes Defense for 2 rounds.

abilities.name: Impede Magic Defense
abilities.description: A targeted strike that stops the innate bodily energy. The strike impedes Magic Defense for 2 rounds.
